item.title: Project 2: Product Pricing Prediction Algorithm with XGBoost
item.description: Problem Statement The R&D department needs assistance in coming up with new product concepts and pricing based on the current product line. Solution Summary The following are some of the product gaps weâ€™ve found in the current line of products. Aluminum Over Mountain Aluminum Triathalon To estimate the price of new bicycle models based on the current fleet. A pricing model using predictive analytics is developed. This keeps the price of new models in line with those of similar models in the marketplace.
